sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update>
    <sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="fiscal_year_or_period" table="x_dosny_dspo_ds1200">
        <active>true</active>
        <array>false</array>
        <attributes/>
        <audit>false</audit>
        <calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {
			try {
// 				var dtePreamble = format(current.created, 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss');
// 				var dte = new Date(dtePreamble).toDate();
				//return current.created; 

				var result = "unkn";
// 				var month = '0';
// 				if (Object.prototype.toString.call(dte) === '[object Date]' ){
// 					// month = (date.getMonth() + 1).toString(); // Get month (0-11), add 1 to get month number (1-12);
// 					month = current.created.toString() + ' became ' + dte.toString();
// 				}
// 				else
// 				{
// 					month = 'dte is not a date object.';
// 				}
// 				return month;
				var month = parseInt(current.created.substring(0,7).substring(5));
				var year = parseInt(current.created.substring(0,4)); // Get year (e.g., 2022)
				if (month >= 7) { // July or later
					result = (year + 1).toString() + "-" + (year + 2).toString().substr(-2); // Next calendar year
				} else { // January to June
					result = year.toString() + "-" + (year + 1).toString().substr(-2) ; // Current year
				}
				return result;
			}
			catch (e){
				//alert("A getFiscalYear error occurred: " + e.message);
				return 'something is wrong: ' +  e.message;
			}

})(current);]]></calculation>
